mapper.insert: insert into iov_fence (fence_id, fence_name, customer_id, fence_type, length, radius, area, coordinate_type, create_time, modify_time, delete_status) values (#{fenceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fenceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fenceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{length,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{radius,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{area,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{coordinateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update iov_fence set fence_name = #{fenceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fence_type = #{fenceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, length = #{length,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, radius = #{radius,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, area = #{area,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coordinate_type = #{coordinateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT} where fence_id = #{fenceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select fence_id, fence_name, customer_id, fence_type, length, radius, area, coordinate_type, create_time, modify_time, delete_status from iov_fence where fence_id = #{fenceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
